description.title: Summary
description.description: Lakshmi, you are a Determined Climber with ambition, focus, and resilience, though you may sometimes internalize setbacks and hesitate to seek help. Your current SAT score is 1180, with an accuracy rate of 66% and time management at 47%. These results demonstrate a solid base that needs extensive development for your ambitious target. Your target score of 1590 is highly ambitious and will require exceptional dedication and strategic preparation by September 2025.

Math: Linear inequalities in one or two variables (71%)
Nonlinear equations in one variable and systems of equations in two variables (45%)

description.title: Study Plan
description.description: The start of any strong study plan begins with review. Before you move forward, take time to go back and focus on the 'Recommended Questions' highlighted in your score reports. These key questions from your SAT Practice Test, Domain Tests, and Endurance Test are where the deepest learning happens. Reviewing them is your first real step toward smarter progress.
